TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IFirewallRuleOperations

Docs.summary: The Azure SQL Database Management API includes operations for managing the server-level Firewall Rules for Azure SQL Database Servers. You cannot manage the database-level firewall rules using the Azure SQL Database Management API; they can only be managed by running the Transact-SQL statements against the master or individual user databases.
